name: Tuck's Duck
description:
Help Ducky, Tuck's little rubber duck, to find his way up the river and passing through obstacles in this highly engaging and very fun to play game. While Ducky is going faster and faster while you play, Tuck's Duck features a great "easy-to-learn-yet-hard-to-master" gameplay experience.

Tuck's Duck is designed to enjoy it with the entire family. Go for the highscore, earn medals and challenge your friends and family.

Tuck's Duck is free and does NOT have any IAP!
